channel.title: Need help with fixing trade dupe bug
channel.description: Theres a bug in most servers where in trade you can DUPE.. it happens on the 2nd screen thats all I'm saying. I dont want to spread it I just want a fix for it.. So you guys who do know it can you help me out?

item.title: Need help with fixing trade dupe bug
item.dc:creator: @coolcool coolcool
item.description:
@coolcool wrote:

K, added but still offline. I send you a pm containing my msn… or you can just check my profile. Haha
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 02:57:41 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help please?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with fixing trade dupe bug
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

lol, add a few booleans (i know how it works too :P). firstscreen, secondscrene, and trading booleans. put them properly throughout the trading method, and on the part where it offers/removes the items from trade, put an

if (secondscrene == true) {

and have it do what you want to the attempted duper.

Read full topic
